quagga.input.body:
Info re the Bingham deal team
----- Forwarded by Barton Clark/HOU/ECT on 09/12/2000 09:56 AM -----

	"Politan, Nicholas H." <PolitaNH@bingham.com>

		 cc: 
		 Subject: FW: Mark Oland Biography.DOC


Bart- Here is Mark's bio.  Others will follow separately.  Thanks.  --Nick


>  -----Original Message-----
> From:  Balukas, Deborah T.
> Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 10:04 AM
> To: Politan, Nicholas H.
> Cc: Silvers, Bruce C.
> Subject: Mark Oland Biography.DOC
>
> Attached is my biography.
>
>  <<Mark Oland Biography.DOC>>

 - Mark Oland Biography.DOC
